description:
Light and strong composite pedals that keep weight and costs down. Sold with toe clips already attached, the Adventure Plus pedal provide a stable pedalling platform and excellent power transfer. Toe clips hold your foot in the optimum pedalling position and the straps lets you cinch in the perfect amount of retention.

  • Toe clips provide improved power transfer and improved efficiency
  • Composite construction is lighter and more affordable, while still being very strong
  • Reflectors help keep you seen
  • 9/16in. chromoly axle
name: Evo Adventure Plus Pedals with Strap
